GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.10.148
GSD.description:
wifi: mac80211: fix crash in beacon protection for P2P-device

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.148 by commit 58c0306d0bcd5f541714bea8765d23111c9af68a, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 9eaf183af741e3d8393eb571ac8aec9ee7d6530e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: wifi: mac80211: fix crash in beacon protection for P2P-device
